properties.areaDesc: Hamlin Beach to Sodus Bay NY; Sodus Bay to Mexico Bay NY
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 11 at 3:45AM EST until February 12 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 knots and waves 5 to 8 feet.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Ontario from Hamlin Beach
to Mexico Bay.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Winds and/or waves will cause hazardous conditions
that could capsize or damage small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST WEDNESDAY
